HWBoard Bike Computer PCB: A KiCad hardware project for building a custom printed circuit board (PCB) designed for a feature-rich, open-source bike computer. Powered by Raspberry Pi Compute Module 0 (CM0), this project supports GPS, ANT+ and I2C sensors, offline maps, and real-time cycling data visualization. Fully open hardware under the CERN Open Hardware Licence v2 - Permissive.
